CET333 Product Development
Programme: MOBILE AND WEB TECHNOLOGY

The Fun Olympic Committee is at the very heart of world sport, supporting every Olympic Movement stakeholder, promoting Olympism worldwide, and overseeing the regular celebration of the Olympic Games. They the governing body of the Olympic movement in the city of Beijing, which promotes Olympic games across the globe and leads the Olympic movement. The committee is organising Olympic games to be held in Beijing after a worldwide pandemic. The committee has requested me to develop an app which the athletes will use while they attend the game that will record their movement, venues/location, dates, and time.
